body.p: Mr White is in Louisville and is expected at home this evening -- Had you not better Telegraph Mr Guthrie to hunt him up and use him I think it necessary, on the conditions you and I agreed --

Respectfully
P. D.
Arsenal Tuesday morning
P. S. Mr White will likely be found at U. S. Hotel
